short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for carbon emissions data on the CDP website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Carbon Emissions Extension used to search for specific content about Carbon Emissions from the website https://cdp.net.

Function:
- Search content from pre-defined keywords (currently defined by the developer and not configurable by the user)
